00021 #ifndef KC_UTIL_H
00022 #define KC_UTIL_H
00023 
00024 #include "KCtree.h"            // kc-tree declarations
00025 
00026 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 //  externally accessible functions
00028 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00029 
00030 void kmEnclRect(        // compute smallest enclosing rectangle
00031     KMpointArray    pa,        // point array
00032     KMidxArray        pidx,        // point indices
00033     int            n,        // number of points
00034     int            dim,        // dimension
00035     KMorthRect    &bnds);            // bounding cube (returned)
00036 
00037 KMcoord kmSpread(        // compute point spread along dimension
00038     KMpointArray    pa,        // point array
00039     KMidxArray        pidx,        // point indices
00040     int            n,        // number of points
00041     int            d);        // dimension to check
00042 
00043 void kmMinMax(            // compute min and max coordinates along dim
00044     KMpointArray    pa,        // point array
00045     KMidxArray        pidx,        // point indices
00046     int            n,        // number of points
00047     int            d,        // dimension to check
00048     KMcoord&        min,        // minimum value (returned)
00049     KMcoord&        max);        // maximum value (returned)
00050 
00051 void kmPlaneSplit(        // split points by a plane
00052     KMpointArray    pa,        // points to split
00053     KMidxArray        pidx,        // point indices
00054     int            n,        // number of points
00055     int            d,        // dimension along which to split
00056     KMcoord        cv,        // cutting value
00057     int            &br1,        // first break (values < cv)
00058     int            &br2);        // second break (values == cv)
00059 
00060 void sl_midpt_split(            // sliding midpoint kd-splitter
00061     KMpointArray    pa,        // point array (unaltered)
00062     KMidxArray        pidx,        // point indices (permuted on return)
00063     const KMorthRect    &bnds,        // bounding rectangle for cell
00064     int            n,        // number of points
00065     int            dim,        // dimension of space
00066     int            &cut_dim,    // cutting dimension (returned)
00067     KMcoord        &cut_val,    // cutting value (returned)
00068     int            &n_lo);        // num of points on low side (returned)
00069 
00070 #endif
